column4: hey guys...i want to be able to view live video or snapshots from my web cam remotely...whats a good app to get me started?
you mean live streaming on the internet?
even if it's advanced and difficult to set? you have no problem with that?
http://blog.devinrkennedy.com/2009/10/live-screencasting-using-ffmpeg.html, it's talking about screencasting, but the principle is similar
